verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Nikupe nini Mungu wangu
Nikupe nini ee Mwokozi
Nikupe nini Bwana wangu
cha kukupendeza.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kila nitakachoshika
mbona bado ni kidogo
Fadhili unazotenda
kwangu mimi naogopa
Ninakuomba Mwokozi
nifanyie msamaha na unipokee
Mema unayoyatenda
nitafanya nini mimi nikurudishie.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nakutolea mkate
toka mmea wa ngano
Nakutolea divai
ni tunda la mzabibu
Ninakuomba Mwokozi
nifanyie msamaha na unipokee
Mema unayoyatenda
nitafanya nini mimi nikurudishie.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mchana hata siku
wewe wanisimamia
Na nikiwa safarini
waniepusha ajali
Ninakuomba Mwokozi
nifanyie msamaha na unipokee
Mema unayoyatenda
nitafanya nini mimi nikurudishie.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Kama njia sioni
Bwana unaniongoza
Na hata nikipotea
kwako unanirudisha
Ninakuomba Mwokozi
nifanyie msamaha na unipokee
Mema unayoyatenda
nitafanya nini mimi nikurudishie.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Nikiwa na matatizo
Bwana hunisaidia
Nikiwa kwenye majonzi
Bwana unanifariji
Nitatoa nini mimi kitakachokuwa
sawa na fadhili zako
Nitaimba nini mimi niyataje
mema yote utendayo kwangu.
